post.title: Thumbnail Studio
post.description: A browser-based thumbnail creation tool no Photoshop required!
post.content:
A browser-based thumbnail creation tool no Photoshop required! Creating thumbnails can become a chore for YouTube content creators, our Thumbnail Studio aims to streamline that process, making it easy for anyone to create a schedule when on the go.

Open Thumbnail Studio
    Here's how to use our thumbnail creator!
  • Open Thumbnail Studio
  • Select your template and theme
  • Edit the colors
  • Edit the text (by clicking it)
  • Add your image (by clicking it)
  • Hit Save
  • ???
  • Profit
Schedule Studio is free to be used in any context (including commercial), but redistribution or resale is strictly prohibited.
